snippet.title: Indie Game Trailer - Sorry Sir, I'm out of controls [GMTK 2020] - Puzzle Game
snippet.description:
You have to navigate Arthur, but you have to choose three control inputs.

This unique little puzzler challenges your mind and decision making. Do you need to jump here? Yes, but you also need to go left, right and forward! Might there be a way only using three buttons?

This game was developed by Henrik "Desaru" Tallen and Nekros Arts during the 48 hour Game Makers Toolkit Gamejam 2020.


Download free at Itchio: https://nekros-arts.itch.io/sorry-sir-im-out-of-controls


Music by Doctor Turtle
